children.value: The workflow is setup for live edit.  ✨
GH pages for an initial deployment to git studio going. Blog is a nuxt template that is content focused serving up .md files.
publish instantly with this vercel Deploy button.
Open a terminal and run the following commands

props.code: npx nuxi init -t themes/content-wind blog
cd blog
npm i && npm run dev
npm run generate

children.value: directory is ready to be deployed!
then upload assets where ever you choose

props.code: npm run build

html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}

This digital clock has FB messenger included and the color you see is based on the current time. The numbers are converted to an HSL color by placing a hash in front of them. For example  8:21 = #821000. clicking the © symbol will access a hidden settings menu.

contents.title: Build a guestbook with NextAuth and Supabase

children.value: Build a guestbook with NextAuth and Supabase
Supabase is an open source Firebase alternative providing all the backend features you need to build a product and offer user more simple UI then Firebase.

props.code:
# npm
npm install @supabase/supabase-js
# yarn
yarn add @supabase/supabase-js

children.value: Remember to disable RLS(Row Level Security) for table
// removeid = table item you want to remove

props.code:
# npm
npm install next-auth
# yarn
yarn add next-auth

children.value: To add NextAuth.js to a project create a file called
All provider set up documentation of NextAuth on
// Configure one or more authentication providers
Supabase and NextAuth are both a perfect choose for beginners who want to learn basic database or building a simple auth login application.
⚡Thanks for reading, see you in the next blog.
